title: Pandora
creator_credit: Derek May, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Experimental filmmaker Derek May and colour cameraman Martin Duckworth collaberated here in a surrealistic retelling of the old myth. A film of technical experiment with forceful, colourful effect and creative use of shadows.
creator_credit_for_label: Derek May, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
